</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Perception** +15

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +17, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +17, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +15, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +16

ceremonial robes, _+1 [glaive](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20)_

**AC** 22

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 120

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_glaive_ +14 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8+6 slashing

**Primal Spontaneous Spells** DC 25, attack +17
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
- **1st**
[Alarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=7), [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Grease](/Spells.aspx?ID=140), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Animal Messenger](/Spells.aspx?ID=11), [Create Food](/Spells.aspx?ID=52), [Glitterdust](/Spells.aspx?ID=136), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Hideous Laughter](/Spells.aspx?ID=150) (4 slots)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Earthbind](/Spells.aspx?ID=94), [Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=104), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289) (4 slots)
- **4th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Hydraulic Torrent](/Spells.aspx?ID=155), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) (3 slots)

**Sorcerer Bloodline Spells 2 Focus Points,** DC 25, attack +17
- **4th**
[Faerie Dust](/Spells.aspx?ID=508), [Fey Disappearance](/Spells.aspx?ID=509)

**Reach Spell** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Metamagic](/Traits.aspx?ID=107)) If the next action the false priestess uses is to Cast a Spell that has a range, increase that spell's range by 30 feet.

**Primal Weapon** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Frequency** once per turn; **Requirements** the false priestess' most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip spell; **Effect** Until the end of the false priestess's next turn, the priestess deals an extra 1d6 slashing damage with her melee Strikes.

</column>
